max-width.comment: The maximum width of the Card.

shadow.comment: The box shadow of the Card on narrow viewports.

shadow-wide-viewport.comment: The box shadow of the Card on wide viewports.

shadow-standout.comment: The box shadow of the Standout Card variant on narrow viewports.

shadow-standout-wide-viewport.comment: The box shadow of the Standout Card variant on wide viewports.

border-radius.comment: The border radius of the Card.

content-padding.comment: The padding of the content inside the Card.

header-bg-color.comment: The background color of the header area for the Highlighted Header Card.

header-text-color.comment: The text color for the Highlighted Header Card.
